channel.title: recording program on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in recording program on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Open Broadcaster Software Logo OBS Studio is a free and open-source cross-platform streaming and recording program built with Qt and maintained by the OBS Project. There are versions of OBS Studio available for Microsoft Windows, macOS, and Linux distributions. OBS Project raises funds on Open Collective and Patreon. Source
You can download theOBSlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: OBS
item.description: OBS Studio is a free and open-source cross-platform streaming and recording program built with Qt and maintained by the OBS Project. There are versions of OBS Studio available for Microsoft Windows, macOS, and Linux distributions. OBS Project raises funds on Open Collective and Patreon. Source
